headline.print_headline: Survey Swaps MetroCards for Meal Receipts
headline.main: Survey Swaps MetroCards for Meal Receipts

docs.lead_paragraph: Workers with the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene have begun approaching patrons outside some chain restaurants and offering them $2 MetroCards in exchange for their dining receipts.
docs.snippet: Workers with the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene have begun approaching patrons outside some chain restaurants and offering them $2 MetroCards in exchange for their dining receipts.

headline.print_headline: Study Says Junk Food Still Dominates Youth TV
headline.main: Study Says Junk Food Still Dominates Youth TV

docs.lead_paragraph: Among the ads aimed at children and teenagers, 72 percent are for candy, snacks, sugary cereals or fast food.
docs.snippet: Among the ads aimed at children and teenagers, 72 percent are for candy, snacks, sugary cereals or fast food.
